name: 李有豐
objective:
分別依歷史及關係、研究方向而分類基本性質。物質之基本構成原理。以非金屬材料，金屬材料與FRP複合材料等，除以理論定義、性質、配試驗及計標來教授學習者研究瞭解如何鑑定選材適用，達到品質要求。
===============================
Physical, chemical, and molecular properties of materials commonly employed in civil engineering works. Influence of these properties on the performance and use of materials. Emphasis on laboratory evaluation of properties that control the performance of materials.
